website_summaries.verdict: It doesn't have a lot of fancy features, but if you're looking for a simple, reliable alarm clock, this is the best on the market right now.
pros: Extremely clear, elegant display makes it super easy to read
Multiple-function alarms add unique convenience factor that separates this clock from the rest of the pack
cons: More expensive than others, but you are paying for a high-quality, durable product

customer_reviews.title: You can't replace battery.
customer_reviews.text: I wrote the company questioning how to replace the battery. Their answer is below: Thanks for reaching out to us. This battery typically lasts a few years, if it needs to be replaced before then please let us know. Kind regards, Sherrylyn Customer Service, American Lifetime This answer is circumventing the answer as I can only assume that the clock would have to be sent back for replacement or repair by them. This is not acceptable and therefore of very poor design not able to be serviced by customer easily. I would not recommend its purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Major Snafu!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered mahogany clock for mother-in-law with Alzheimer disease. Received white. Clock was fingerprinted, dirty, AND did not work. Box was handled and there were no instructions included. Disappointed and saddened as it was an anticipated gift and advertised with the elderly in mind. I am easy and would have kept the white, though ordered mahogany, but it did not work and was obviously pre-handled and defective. Not even sure how all of this could happen. Sure hope to see manufacturer get on top of this quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Ken L. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Not what we wanted for our mother who is very sick and has trouble keeping up with the days of the week and the time of day (am/pm). The writing to wayyyy to small and this picture is inaccurate as to the size of the letters/numbers. The face of the clock is smaller than a 7inch tablet. We are returning it because it definitely is not worth almost $50.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this clock for my mother who is in an assisted living facility. She has been struggling with short term memory and her ability to keep track of the days, date, and month. When we installed it on the wall in her apartment she was so HAPPY! She thought it was the most AMAZING clock she has ever seen! Our whole visit that day she kept referring to her AMAZING clock. This product IS just that...AMAZING! I never imagined the JOY my mom would feel. Thank you for providing such a TOP NOTCH product and helping to make my 91 year old mother one HAPPY lady!
customer_reviews.author: AJMac

customer_reviews.title: Great Clock for people with memory issues.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clock for my dad who is experiencing memory issues, and cannot remember the day or date. In addition, he gets morning and evenings confused. He often cannot tell if it is 6 am or 6 pm. This clock is perfect! Large lettering and easy to read layout. He needs constant reminding, and this clock does the trick. It is very handsome, and I like the fact that it comes with different color frames - if you so choose. I plan on ordering more for his bedroom and other living areas, so the different style frames will work nicely. I highly recommend this clock.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Parker

customer_reviews.title: Goes blank and stays blank at random times.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE !! I bought this travesty in November. By December this junk stopped working twice. The 1st time it remained blank for 2 days, then suddenly started working again (I had left it plugged in the whole time). The 2nd time it died and stayed dead. I asked for someone to call to work through troubleshooting. Nobody called. I have now emailed asking for a refund. Here's hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Fence Mitehell

customer_reviews.title: Broken junk
customer_reviews.text: Dear American Lifetime company! I was excited to receive a clock which is a very pricey (41$) and reliable. Instead I got a piece of junk which is broken (pictures attached). You want my honest review: well I am dissatisfied, disappointed at very least. Btw, why do you make a hole to hang it on the wall if it has a cord, not battery operated. Just useless. Amazon shoppers, I strongly recommend spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Viktoriia

customer_reviews.title: A great help
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother who struggles with dementia. This clock is an awesome way to help her know if it's time to go to breakfast or supper because she gets confused. It makes her not rely on others to remind her to take medication, as well. It gives me peace of mind knowing that if I can't make a phone call to remind her, the clock does it for me. The feature that I especially like is that the alarm rings for less than a minute and shuts off by itself. Thus, my mother does not struggle trying to find a button to push. This company pretty much thought of everything. Well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen J.

customer_reviews.title: Not White on Black! Not highe contrast!
customer_reviews.text: The picture and the description is very misleading and actually wrong. The description says you can choose between white or yellow lettering. But the "white" is actually a dull bluish tint. The day time brightness is not that bright and looks nothing like the pictures in color or brightness. This makes the contrast much less distinctive. This is not a high contrast clock and it makes it harder to read the smaller calendar date. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ed

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed stopped working in 9 days.
customer_reviews.text: After trying another clock, one that you could record your own messages to go with the 6 alarms, it stopped working after 3 months. So we bought this one, made in USA and 1 yr warranty, it worked fine, then on the 9th day it stopped and the screen just has a while fuzzy line down the middle of the screen. I bought the 2 most positive-reviewed clocks, and neither worked. The changes are not easy with a dementia patient, and now what do we do?
customer_reviews.author: Nori S Lira

customer_reviews.title: This is a great help to 92-year-old
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an elderly relative, who finds it very helpful for knowing the day of the week and also, when awakening from a nap, knowing the time of day (e.g. 6pm can look like dawn or dusk outside, so seeing "morning" or "evening" displayed on the clock helps.) So far, it keeps time well, and the battery backup was recently helpful during a brief power outage. It is a nice-looking clock, but I subtracted a star because if one hangs this on the wall, as I did, the power cord extending down the wall is a bit unsightly. Also, the $43.95 price seemed high for a clock.
customer_reviews.author: Maryland Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Good at what it does
customer_reviews.text: Good at what it does, but (1) display would be much better if 10-20% bigger, so that it could be mounted for viewing across a small room where other large models would be far too big, (2) contrary to the instructions, alarm "message" will not record or show but just keeps returning to"message" instead of the options shown, and (3) there is an option to display 12 or 24 hour digital time, but there is no way to show A.M. or P.M. on the alarm settings, which means that to use the alarm you have to choose 24 hour display (not good for my cognitively impaired wife).----R. C. C.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just a Great Clock
customer_reviews.text: Clock does everything it says it will do. Instantaneously able to see the day....time....date and year....even shows you if it is morning or night ...even if it is before dawn. Just a great aid for the elderly....people who for health reasons can get confused....or just terrific for people who wake at 3:00am with heads still asleep. All the information is clearly displayed there...and on one screen. Plus....it just looks great....comes in black trim....walnut frame ...and other choices. It's just a great, great clock. Can't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: JRS

customer_reviews.title: The perfect solution for my Mom’s growing forgetfulness.
customer_reviews.text: Best gift I could have found! This clock has been a godsend for my mother who is 90. She recently admitted to getting her days mixup. This clock helps her know when to eat and more importantly the day and time a family member is coming over to pick her up. This has provided her with some independence that she seems to have lost with her slight memory loss. Our parents are proud and it’s difficult for them to admit they are struggling to maintain the memory they’ve had in their youth. If you have someone that is a senior in your family, consider this as a gift. They may not want to burden you with their forgetfulness.
customer_reviews.author: Cissy

customer_reviews.title: Great with an annoyance.
customer_reviews.text: My biggest gripe with this clock is that it does not auto adjust for Daylight saving time. You will have to adjust it twice a year I in most of the US. The good. The display is where the clock shines and makes up for the above annoyance. Clock is easy enough for my 74 year old mother to see across her bedroom. Can see it from angles. The display is crisp and font is easy to read. Some might find it small for a big room and poor eyesight. It does have to be plugged in so hanging on the wall is not beautiful with a cord hanging down
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: The clock has only a 30 day warranty. Mine ...
customer_reviews.text: The clock has only a 30 day warranty. Mine loses a minute every few days. Then have to adjust the time. It took me at least 30 days to figure that out. I used my cable time to match times. It has a USB port with no instructions nor "battery back-up" information. The price was not worth it..
customer_reviews.author: Gunnard Hedwall

customer_reviews.title: One of my best Amazon purchases
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had our two for more than a year now and absolutely LOVE them. These guys are completely idiot proof, even going so far as displaying the time of day (early morning, morning, afternoon, etc.) I decided to add this review to the general acclaim. It can be seen all times of the day and night, darkness or light. The only improvement I can think of is making it cordless, but then it would have to be charged constantly, so leaving it plugged in is not a problem in the least. Every few months I’ll tweak the time, as one runs a hair slow and the other a hair fast. Five stars anyway—close enough to perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Alzheimer’s- don’t get mahogany
customer_reviews.text: This is EXACTLY what my father needed to help my mother with Alzheimer’s. She has a lot of anxiety around knowing the date and time of day and asks repeatedly throughout the day. This clock has EVERYTHING she needs to know and is highly visible. It’s such a relief for both of them. The black and white frames are fine, but the “mahogany “ frame is actually blue and purple stripes/smears. Really weird looking and in no way looks like wood. Returned and replaced with black. I actually bought 3 clocks for them so she has access to the information throughout the house. Definitely recommend the black and white versions.
customer_reviews.author: S. Griscom

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Self Adjust for Daylight Savings Time
customer_reviews.text: This clock DOES NOT self adjust for daylight saving time changes. My mother is not able to set it herself. Originally 5 stars but for $50 and marketing for dementia patients I am very disappointed. Original review - Great addition to my Mother's home. She has dementia and is not always sure if it is morning or night - this helps tremendously! Big letters and numbers and a nice finish.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Mom needed this!
customer_reviews.text: Mom needed this in her den. She's getting forgetful and also gets anxious when she can't figure things out, such as what day it is. This solved alot of worry and I even bought a second one for the kitchen, and going to buy a 3rd for her bedroom. It's very bright and clear and has all the info needed. Stands perfectly. The one small con is when hanging, the cord weight tends to tip it a bit so it hangs a bit crooked.
customer_reviews.author: Myra

customer_reviews.title: Just what she needed
customer_reviews.text: My 101-yer-old mother-in-law has severe macular degeneration, and she recently relocated to assisted living. It's been a big change for her, with many challenging adjustments. She has a weekly outing to the local senior center, and she needs to book her Access bus transportation a day ahead. She missed a few weeks because she mixed up her days, so I went looking for a solution. Amazon offered several options, and after reading some reviews i selected this one. It arrived promptly, and it was just what she needed. Everything on the face is big and clear, and she really likes it. I can't speak about the durability, she's only had it for 11 days, but I'm hoping for longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Overholt

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Clock
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift because I was losing track of days. It is such a wonderful gift for an elderly person such as myself. So easy to see. The only thing I notice is that it gains time. I've had it about 6 months and it has picked up 5 min. I can't see how to fix it so it does not do that, so I have to go in and do it manually. The other feature that would have been wonderful is the Atomic feature so it resets itself, especially savings time. It's difficult for the elderly and this would have been very helpful. Other than that you must gift this to your elderly friend or relative.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Nice, easy to read, but has some flaws
customer_reviews.text: If there is a way to lower the volume, someone PLEASE tell me. We love having the chime every hour, but it is so loud that we have to stop tallking on the phone. The caller complains too, it is so loud and disruptive. Also, we wish we could set the range of hours the chime goes off. There are a couple choices, but not many. We picked 9 to 6, but want 7 to 9. Wish it synced to the atomic clock, and did daylight savings. There are many of these clocks, and if I need another, I will ask more questions. Nice looking, though, easy to read, and much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Noone

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money so far
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my elderly mother who has trouble remembering the day. So far she's very pleased with the product. The display is bright and very readable during the day and night. I'm a bit concerned about the lightweight construction. I can easily see it breaking if it is ever dropped. The single fold out support leg is a bit flimsy. But all in all, it does what it was advertised to do. I just ordered two more units - another one for mom and one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: EG Haleiwa

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with memory issues
customer_reviews.text: I got this clock last year for a relative with memory issues. It sits on a table in their family room. They do need to be gently reminded to look at the clock sometimes when asking repeatedly what day or time it is. But when they do notice the clock, they love that it tells them all the pertinent time and date information without having to ask. They don't use the alarms, so I can't comment on those. It's large enough to be easily readable from across the room, but not so big that it's unwieldy or unattractive. So far, it's held up for about 7 months with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: joan_smiths

customer_reviews.title: I should have read the reviews
customer_reviews.text: The first problem I have is, it has to be plugged into the wall The cord where it plugs into the clock is on the right side, and constantly makes the clock tilt. It doesn't automatically adjust for daylight savings. I thought it had a wooden frame, but it's just cheap plastic. The display isn't sharp, it's slightly blurry, maybe 320p very low resolution. For the price and rating I really expected a higher quality product. I will be sending mine back.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Simms

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Us
customer_reviews.text: I will admit, I was just browsing clocks. We needed once in our living room since we got rid of our cable box which had been our timepiece for way too long. I saw this and smiled. This is absolutely perfect for us, because it tells us everything, date and time and even which part of the day we're enjoying. Trust me, during a winter in Texas, sometimes you wonder. I'm extremely pleased with it. We put it on an end table instead of the wall there I thought I would put it. It fits in well with the other pictures on the table.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Richter

customer_reviews.title: A big help for elderly people
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help my father who is suffering from dementia. I would have given this 4 or 5 stars except for the medicine reminder alarm. The reminder is one of the features that I wanted, but to turn off the alarm you have to " push any button " they are all on the back ! They are hard to get to and my Dad kept hitting more that 1 button and messing up the settings. These should have an alarm cancel button on the top, easy to get to. But it is nice looking, always there for him. He does like it and it is always there for him.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: THE PERFECT SOLUTION
customer_reviews.text: The Day Clock is exactly as described, and I was pleasantly surprised to see that nothing had to be done after plugging it in. Was completely set up and ready to go. It is a beautiful piece and is lit appropriately without the "glow" that some digital clocks have. The most important feature is having "Afternoon", etc. because confusion has begun to set in with my mother regarding night & day. Actually seeing it written has cleared one area of confusion. The other features are nice, but not really needed for her purposes. Great clock!
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Beltran

customer_reviews.title: 3rd Time is a charm?
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift, It didn't work out of the box.I returned it and got another one. It didn't work either. I called the company direct and got another one. It didn't work. I called them again and spent an hour on the phone troubleshooting and trying different codes. It finally works. Upside - the person on the phone was polite and helpful. Downside - I spent $500 dollars worth of my time on a $40 clock. If I were as smart as I think I am I would have thrown it away and bought a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Russ O.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps time even if electricity fails.
customer_reviews.text: My Mom, age 90, lives this clock. She got her walker caught in the cord of her first one and it fell off the bookcase headboard of her bed. She asked me to order another one just like it for replacement. She can no longer handle alarm clock with screw pins to set time and alarm so she loves this one. If electricity goes off, the internal battery keeps time and when electricity comes back on, it has maintained the correct time. She also loves that it tells her what day of the week it is as well as the date. Great for her in Assisted Living!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 86 year old mother in-law. In fact, it is the second one I bought her. It helps her keep track of the time and the day of the week. It is easily read (large displayed numbers/words) and even has a battery backup to keep the date/time correct in case of a power loss. As the description says, it will not display during a power outage, but does retain the date/time in memory so you do not have to reset it once the power comes back on. Great product, helps her a lot and no problems with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: [Newest Version] Day Clock - Extra Large...
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for for my elderly parents as far as visibility and information. I would have preferred battery operated. It is rather inconvenient to have to plug it in to AC power. I ordered "wood" color and received RED. What a surprise. My parents didn't really care, so I kept it. I don't know if the wrong one was shipped, or there was a problem with the way it was labeled, but it wasn't "wood" colored. I checked my order on Amazon and I ordered the right one. My husband wants one now and I probably will order another, but I will be cautious about my color and hope it isn't red.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Johnston

customer_reviews.title: super small
customer_reviews.text: super small dont buy not worth 45 dollars.. how many of you are paid promoters. This is junk.. where is the battery backup.. oh doesn’t have one.. check the size not worth 45 dollars
customer_reviews.author: Scord5

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my elderly father as he would get confused by the time of day and what the date was. I set it up and everything was great right out of the box when I plugged it in except the clock was off by about 20 minutes, which took maybe 15 seconds to adjust. The display is bright, large and easy to read for him and he is extremely happy with the clock. Of the few reviews where people seemed to have problems about 90% or more could be resolved with taking 60 seconds to read the directions. I would recommend this product and I would not hesitate to purchase again should the need arise.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisInMaryville

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mother, who unfortunately has short term memory loss. This clock is absolutely perfect for her. Large, crystal clear display, and so easy to set up. I simply could not be happier with this product. One more thing I want to mention is, the customer service is the BEST!. The first one I received simply did not work, it was dead, no power. I called American Lifetime and without hesitation my issue was taken care of. They matched the "Prime Days" price I paid, and we exchanged emails until the new clock arrived and I could make sure it worked. I couldn't be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: wombat

customer_reviews.title: Great clock needs changes
customer_reviews.text: This is a great clock at a fair price. The clarity of letters and numbers is outstanding. Here are things I would change: 1. The night brightness level is not adjustable. There is just one night level and it is too bright for comfort while sleeping. 2. The useless designation of Morning, Night etc is in easily readable letters prominently shown directly the day of the week. The much more useful Month and Date of the month are in much smaller type at the very bottom of the display. The clock already shows AM and PM beside the time in the 12 hour mode and a 24 hour mode does not need any more information displayed.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Neely

customer_reviews.title: Needs A Chord To Work.....
customer_reviews.text: This is a Wall Clock, but you have to plug it in for it to work! Are you kidding me? Who makes a wall clock that needs to be plugged in? It doesn't even take a battery. Why would anyone want an ugly chord running down the wall? Ridiculous! Very disappointed! Returned it. How bad is it to put a battery port on a clock?'
customer_reviews.author: DonAnon

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: We recently cut the cord on cable in our home. With in an hour we realized that our only time piece in the livingroom was gone. We are a multigenerational family and this is a great item. Since I became a stay at home care giver to our two 85 year olds and 7 year old I find, like the our older folks, that I loose track of the days. This solves all of our issues across the board. The display is bright and a great size. You can see it from everywhere in the room and now we all know the date, day of the week and time. I think all care facilities should have these!
customer_reviews.author: M. Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Great Clock
customer_reviews.text: I love that the clock has big writing, displays the day, date and time, and has a back-up battery just in case of a power failure. The clock appears to be well-made - and looks very classy with the wood trim. It does not feel or appear "cheap". I purchased this clock for my father who has dementia and cannot remember the day of the week. He asks several times a day "what's today?" Now, he can feel more independent and in control by simply looking up and reading the day himself. When we now ask him "What's today?", he smiles widely and gives the correct answer.
customer_reviews.author: Debi M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read Time-Year-Month-Day
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit gift. Excellent for someone who keeps forgetting what day, month and year it is. Plus is shows the time. Do wish the brightness could be adjusted so that when it is in a dim or dark room it is not so very harsh to look at. For the user, the auto-dimming is not dimmed down enough for a dark room and it seems like it only activates for the evening hours. For now I've taped a piece of tinted see-through plastic in front of the screen. (Cut the plastic from a tinted translucent file folder).
customer_reviews.author: Lorry

customer_reviews.title: 21st century clock for a 20th century gal.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the clock/calendar for a family friend. She was getting on in years and sometimes had difficulties remembering what the date/day was [as many of us do]. Her schedule is kept in a regular planner or written on the calendar. Without a smart phone to reference I figured this option would be best for her needs. It was. In a central location, she is able to, at a glance, to see the date, day, and time. She loves it. The lack of glare helps at all hours of the day as well. Now she doesn't have to ponder the passage of time just reference it when she needs to keep appointments.
customer_reviews.author: DC_Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Dont like the alarm settings
customer_reviews.text: I just received it and set it up for my dementia father. The clock is a bit smaller than I expected but the numbers and words are bright. The only thing I can see thats disappointing is there is no volume control. Its very loud, which is good but the duration of the alarm is too long and beeping that loud for that long may scare my father... therefore, will not be able to use the alarm. I wish I could set the duration to just a couple rings. Expensive clock... lets see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Woofter

customer_reviews.title: Great help for my forgetful father
customer_reviews.text: This alarm clock was recommended for my father who is suffering from the onset of dementia and often forgets to take his twice daily pills (I fill his pill organizer). Previously, I would try to call him twice a day to remind him to take his meds, but that didn’t always work out. This clock has been wonderful! The full date, including day of week and time and whether it is morning or afternoon, is completely spelled out. The alarm is set for twice daily, including a message stating to take morning (or evening) medicine. This has been a tremendous help! At least for now, I have one less worry.
customer_reviews.author: Connie P

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: My mother is 93 and has severe old age forgetfulness. She is almost blind too. However, she still manages and wants to live on her own. She forgets what day it is continuously and we were getting multiple calls from her daily asking what day of the week it was. We were hoping this day clock would give her (and us) some peace of mind. It has been wonderful. The days of the week are complete words and she can easily read them. She is also very happy to be able to see the time with no problem. We are all grateful for this wonderful clock. We wish we had bought it last year. It's worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Bananaann

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: My mother-in-law is in an assisted living facility w/dementia. Every time we visit she asks what day it is, what time of day, what month, etc. We have a calendar in her room but she's at the stage now where it means nothing to her and she can't follow along with the days. This clock is perfect. I can't believe you just plug it in and the correct date/time already appears. You don't have to set anything. It's very bright. I like the fact that it specifies morning and evening. It's just one less thing for her to be confused about and I think that made her happy. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: WestViewPark234

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Little Clock
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother, who is suffering from disorientation and diminished memory. It should be helpful when it's dark outside and she can't sense whether it is early morning or evening. Because the clock provides so much information, including date, day, time, and morning/evening words, I am hopeful she can avoid getting dressed up in middle of the night. The clock arrived with the time properly set. The battery backup is invisibly installed and working when it is delivered (I guess it is self-charging). A small pull-out leg helps the clock stand up. The Menu button makes it easy to change settings. I am very impressed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JoyOnline

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my 93-year-old mother-in-law when she moved to an Assisted Living facility. She has very poor eyesight due to Wet MD and Glaucoma. This clock works well in her living room that she can see it from 10' away. Now she won't miss her favorite activities. The only complain I have is it lists both PM and afternoon (see picture). Kind of redundant, would rather see bigger date than PM & Afternoon next to each other.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for dementia/Alzheimer’s
customer_reviews.text: My father has early dementia so he had been forgetting what day/time it was and was asking us repeatedly. To help him and us out we purchased this clock and placed it in the room he spends most of his time in. He no longer asks us what day/time it is. The letters/numbers are large enough he can read them without his glasses and it also shows what part of the day it is such as dawn or dusk, afternoon or morning and day of the week. I highly recommend this if you’re loved one is having a hard time remembering what day it is.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Some great features
customer_reviews.text: Pretty basic clock that does the job for what we need. My son is on the spectrum (Asperger's) and this is perfect for assisting him with navigating time/number issues. Note: hit the "ok" button if yours arrives set to the "it's (day) in the "afternoon/evening/etc" setting. You'd think for the price it would be at the default setting for the clock...hopefully this is usually a gift, as I can't imagine navigating something like this would be easy for a loved one with some issue to face that makes a need for a clock like this. Otherwise, happy with the purchase. Also, love that it says "Morning, Afternoon, and Evening"!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cortina Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant idea
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this clock. It was easy to set up and actually came with the correct date and day. Just needed to adjust the time and set up the other features to our liking. The night time dimmer is what sold me. The only negative would be the kick stand. Twisting it out from the back of the clock was uncomfortable. I felt I was going to break it off. But it all went well. Perfect clock for my dementia husband. It has already proven useful when my husband got up at 10:00 pm thinking it was 10:00 am. Fortunately he is able to understand pm vs am and I could point out the word Night. Very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: R. Tuel

customer_reviews.title: Great clock, especially for the elderly.
customer_reviews.text: I love this clock. I bought it for my elderly aunt. It helps not only her, but my husband and I also when we are at her house. The print is large. It gives such helpful information besides the time, such as the date and what time of day it is, morning, afternoon, evening or night. Great for someone who has trouble knowing if it is morning or night. She is taking it with her when she moves and we might buy another one for ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large, clear letters and numbers
customer_reviews.text: This was incredibly easy to set up. I plugged it in, pulled out the rest, turned it around to see if I needed to reset it and it was already up and running. Mom loves being able to read the time, day and date. In fact, she wants me to get another one for the bedroom. I haven't tried any of the features yet, but it already does everything that I need it to, so who cares what else it might be able to do. Love it and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Polanka

customer_reviews.title: Too bright at night.
customer_reviews.text: Good clock with a great viewing angle and good black level. However the nighttime (or low) brightness was way too bright and it’s not adjustable (which the manufacturer promptly confirmed). This clock is on the right, the Robin clock is on the left. The Robin has far more adjustments and, to me, is far easier to read. The American Lifetime clock is YELLING using all upper-case. I returned it and kept the Robin.
customer_reviews.author: Cave Creek AZ

customer_reviews.title: I love this clock!
customer_reviews.text: We use this clock in our living room. We have the usual digital TV clock plus a regular clock up on the wall, but had trouble seeing either one of them clearly. My husband frequently forgets what day it is (he's not senile, just retired) and now he doesn't have to ask me. I like that it isn't as bright at night, but it's still very easy to read from across the room. It was very easy and quick to set up. Nothing bad to say about this clock at all. I highly recommend it; it was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: farmkiti

customer_reviews.title: Light is perfectly calm with no glare at all
customer_reviews.text: Excellent easy set-up, just needed to adjust minutes. Bought used from Seller: Thriftycomputer at a great price. My 1st purchase of this product item was bought new for a relative as a gift They both rave at how much they appreciate the clock & how useful it is daily every time I visit there. They told me they saw on the clock it was pre-dawn on the clock coming home from an unexpected hospital visit. I know now myself that is what is displayed after midnight. Very nice added bonus indeed as it was not in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Note
customer_reviews.text: The clocks are great! One suggestion is to have these be both electric or battery. I know you have it sat up if electricity goes off then the battery takes over but I'm suggesting of purchaser wants just battery that is the way it works best for them. Example: Me--the place where I can plug in the cord into the wall socket doesn't fit. My suggestion make it so clock can be started either battery or electricity. The clock is attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Lund

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Just WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this amazing clock for my 94 year old mom. SHE ABSOLUTELY LOVES IT as she'd been having trouble with memory loss. Shows the time, whether it's morning/afternoon/night, what day of the week it is, the month and date are in large, clear letters she can easily see. Unbox and plug in ... that's it! I chose the black polished metal frame version and it looks terrific on a table, where she can view it from her favorite recliner and couch. The size is perfect at approximately 10" X 7".
customer_reviews.author: Carol D.

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Alarm Clock Ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this clock. It gives you the day, month, year and time. It displays whether is morning, noon, evening, or night. Everything is noted on the clock in bold letters. Directions are easy to follow and memorable, but don't discard your instructions (just in case). The clock allows you to set alarms that are important to you and as many alarms as you need. The alarm stops automatically. For instance, I have four alarms set for daily with info displayed on screen telling me what the alarm is for. Greatest clock I've ever purchased and you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: margaret perry

customer_reviews.title: Great, exactly as advertised and pictured
customer_reviews.text: This clock is great, exactly as advertised and pictured. I have a long living room, with a wall clock at one end for use in the dining room, however most of the sitting area is at the other end of the room. It was getting to be a real pain having to get up and walk to the dining room to see the time. I have now moved the wall clock into the kitchen, where it really belonged, and replaced it with this Day Clock. Now we can see the day, time and date from anywhere in the room. It's crystal clear and very handy.
customer_reviews.author: noeau

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for my Mom
customer_reviews.text: This is great for an older person. It tells not only date and time, but day, it has a medicine reminder or any other reminder that you want to display, alarms too. Very nice if you loved one forgets what day it is or to take their medicine. A reminder will come on when you set it and it will display did you take your medicine? then the message remains there as long as you like. 1 hour, 2 hours whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn A.

customer_reviews.title: Great clock for memory impaired
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for someone with memory problems. Large and bright enough screen to see time of day, day of week, month date year. Also allows to program a selection of messages in the alarm system . For me , I was able to set alarm for 9:00 am and 8 pm . My client sees message at 9:00 “take your morning medication” and at 8 pm alarm goes off and message reads “ take your night pill.” very helpful! Thank you for thinking of ways to improve the lives of those that struggle with impaired memories.
customer_reviews.author: elaine

customer_reviews.title: Nice but need improvement
customer_reviews.text: Please allow us to change the order of each line. I like the date on 2nd line. The "night", "morning", etc are not important to me. It would be nice if I can turn that off. With that saved space, then I like to make all font bigger. Please allow different color on each line too but it is not too important. I still wonder if the time is accurate on this clock. I have to re-adjust the time by a minute twice in last few months. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: iLikeAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Take my word on this product and buying experience.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about my experience of this purchase totally met AND exceeded my expectations. I could not be more pleased. I Love this shopping at home, for starters, I don’t have to get out, deal with people, ( most are nice, but some are just plain stupid). But mainly, I am sooooooo pleased with my 🕰! It has sooooooo many functions, it gives so much information at a glance. I don’t think I have discovered everything it does yet. All I know is it does everything but wash the dishes and clean the house. I absolutely LOVE ❤️ it ! ! !
customer_reviews.author: Deb Moad

customer_reviews.title: Best clock for seasoned adults
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this clock because I wanted to be able to read the time from a distance and easily determine the day of the week. I was not disappointed. This is THE best clock ever. You can hang it on the wall or sit it on a desk, table, or stand. The numbers are large enough for you to see along with the day of the week. I simply love this clock. I would truly recommend it for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Elderly with Issues
customer_reviews.text: My husband was a draftee who hated the Army --- but he liked military time and its simplicity. So now he has some issues with keeping time straight and I finally realized that what he needed was a 24-hour clock. I looked at many -- round ones, square ones, etc. and then I found this one and bought it. I plan to hang it on the wall so he can look at it first thing in the morning or during the night to get some orientation about day of the week, time of day, even the date. It's exactly what he's wanted. It addresses the issue much better than I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalGal

customer_reviews.title: Throwing it away today
customer_reviews.text: My clock came with many problems. It buzzed loudly for 3 or 4 days until I hit it a few times. It was much too bright. It lit up my whole room. And it was difficult to set the alarm. So I started using my iPad for an alarm. And then I started turning the clock face down because it was too bright. Then I stopped using it completely. I bought a new clock a few days ago that is fantastic, so I’m throwing this one away.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Crapuchettes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect--except for one major design flaw
customer_reviews.text: This model has one major flaw. It must be placed where you can easily access the back of the clock. After even a few-second power outage it automatically switches to a less informative mode that does not show the time--it shows something like "It is now morning". That can only be reset by pushing the "OK" button on the back of the clock. We live in an area where the power drops frequently, so I find myself having to change the mode on this clock too often. The clock has battery backup so I'm not sure why they felt this feature was necessary, but I don't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great clock...still ticking!
customer_reviews.text: Recently I ordered a very similar clock that had issues from the start...the screen kept going off and on and the date and time would change! Not too good for a clock for the elderly who are already confused!! The clock I purchased from American Lifetime worked perfectly from the start and after several months is still working perfectly. I received three emails from American Lifetime asking me if I was satisfied (wow!) with my purchase. I would highly recommend this clock...there are several online that look the same, but the quality is just not there. Kudos to American Lifetime for your excellent product and customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Stone

customer_reviews.title: Best clock i ever purchase
customer_reviews.text: i have one family member that has a hard time remembering thing so this clock really helps them out and it's real easy to set up i'm buy two more to leave in various parts of the house great clock design and i like it to i fine my self not looking at the calendars so much because it has its own calendar. it seems america lifetime company really cares about their products because when you buy this clock they contact you by email to make sure you're happy with it . Where do you find that any more ? nice to see there companies still out that care !!!
customer_reviews.author: repair shop

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Clock!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing clock which will help my 94 year old mother so much. She is getting to the point that if she takes a nap, when she wakes up, does not know it is the same day. I thought the set up would be complicated, but I just plugged it in and it worked. It already had the right time, day, and date. I can't wait to give it to her, but I am sure she will be delighted!! Thank you American Lifetime so much for this great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellant clock for the memory challanged
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mom who has dementia and she really loved it. I love the fact that it has rather it is morning, afternoon and evening on it. time for dementia patients becomes mixed up but this clock has helped my mom be able to tell rather it is day or night. I just wish that there was some way to pick which features that you wanted to make bigger on the screen. The date is a little small. I would recommend this product to anyone who has a person in their lives with Alzheimer or dementia. It has made a huge difference to my mom.
customer_reviews.author: katie mcgraw

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good, Works As Promised
customer_reviews.text: The clock is very easy to setup and change some of the default settings. It’s being used in the living room, so I can’t comment on the alarm features. I have however turned the hourly chime off. It’s quite loud, wish it had a volume control. All in all it works good and looks good. The clock has a USB port that’s “for service upgrades only”, why have it then? Lastly the battery backup that holds the settings in a power outage does not seem to be user replaceable, that’s odd. As time goes on I will update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Hey Al

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, useful product!
customer_reviews.text: This clock is about as perfect as it can be. We received our first Day Clock, used, from a friend when I told her about my husband's growing confusion about what day of the week it was. It was the *perfect* solution for him, and we both found that it was nice having a clock that could very easily be read from across a large room. Recently, that Day Clock broke, and I *immediately* ordered a new one. The finish on this model (limited edition black polished metal) is particularly nice. Thank you, American Lifetime, for such a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Tan

customer_reviews.title: Vital item for my parents
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clock when my Dad had trouble remembering which day of the week it was and took his medication incorrectly as a result. My parents each have told me how much they love the clock and how much it helps them every single day. We have one alarm set for a daily medication my Dad takes outside of normal mealtimes. He’d never remember to take it if not for this clock. The clock gains a couple of minutes every few months and I just fix it in two seconds for them. So easy to navigate the menu. GET THIS CLOCK FOR YOUR LOVED ONES - do not hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: betzjo

customer_reviews.title: A unique product.
customer_reviews.text: Was surprized how easy it was set, program. Nicely laid out. Easy to read. It was not able to pick up time adjustment signal but it is easy to set, not a big problem. To wall hang the power chord pulls the clock off from hanging level. I used the power chord wire tie and wired the cord to the folded in desk foot, to pull, fall straight down the center of the clock bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Tim B.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our needs. While some reviewers felt the clock emitted too much light for an otherwise dark sleeping room, we found that by selecting the yellow color for the numbers and letters, the resulting light level was just fine for our needs. Our clock is about ten feet from the head of the bed and that may be a factor as well. Excellent product with many set-up and alarm options. Future models will hopefully have a battery backup which will continue operations during power blackouts and an automatic daylight savings time adjustment but the product is super helpful to us as it is.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: great clock
customer_reviews.text: I just gave this clock to my 93 1/2 yr. old mother and she absolutely loves it! She goes to bed very early (8 PM) and sometimes gets confused when she wakes up in the middle of the night- if it's time to get up. She had a hard time seeing the time with her old clock. That won't be the case anymore as all the information she needs will be right in front of her spelled out clearly. I can't thank you enough for developing this type of device, it will make my mom's life so much easier. Seeing her so happy when I gave this clock to her, made my day too !
customer_reviews.author: Linda Z.

customer_reviews.title: Isn’t the prime function of this item to keep the time?
customer_reviews.text: It’s a clock. You look at it for the time. At the end of the first week it was ahead 2 minutes. By the end of the second week it was ahead 4 minutes. I reset it to see if it was me, maybe I didn’t set it right the first time? Nope. I’ve let it go since then and it is now 8 minutes ahead. Into the trash it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Nick L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent clock for people with Dementia
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent clock for people with dementia or Alzheimer’s. Clear to read, programmable to change the time of day setting to “Wednesday Evening”, Also features alarms for medication reminders. My grandma with mild dementia lived alone and it helped her so much to know what time of day it was, the year etc. I loved this clock so much I bought 2 and they have held up for 3 years now. Thank you for helping my grandma!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Salens

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!  Great for seniors (even clumsy ones)
customer_reviews.text: Bought for mom's nursing home room. Everyone kept asking me where I got it! Mom loves it...no longer confused about what day or time of day it is. Didn't have any nails, so just hung on her corkboard using a big pushpin. Since the cord has to go behind her bed over to the wall outlet in the middle of the room, it was a little short. Every once in a while she catches it when making her bed and it falls to the bureau underneath...BUT it keeps on working!! Now that it's winter and dark at 6 am and 6 pm, I'm thinking of getting one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Charisma501

customer_reviews.title: Love this clock
customer_reviews.text: I bought a different clock to replace my old one, but was not happy with how the time was displayed in bright red and I had a hard time setting the tame and alarm. This clock is literally plug and play. I like the easy to read display in white. I also love knowing the day of the week and date on the calendar when I wake up each morning. No one in our house needs this information for any other reason than it is just nice to know. I recommend this clock.
customer_reviews.author: Teacup

customer_reviews.title: Don’t by for a alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: Like the display. The only problem is if you want to use as a alarm clock to shut off you have to find a button on the back of it which is not handy. Updated 2/19/2020. Clock gains at least 4 to 5 minutes per month. POS beware . I’m donating it and buying another one that works.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Husted

customer_reviews.title: Great for elderly with dementia
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this in the wood grain frame for my mom for Xmas. We both thought it looked cheap. I returned it & ordered it in the black frame. Great choice. Mom is real happy with the very easy to read display. Especially being retired she gets confused as to the day & sometimes if it’s morning or evening. This is sort of a lifesaver for her & something that makes her very happy.
customer_reviews.author: walley

customer_reviews.title: Good product but odd design
customer_reviews.text: I like this clock, it really helped my aging mother with knowing when to take her medication. The only real downside of this is that you have to hit a button around the back of the unit to turn off the alarm. Given this product is really designed to help people with declining cognition it really needs a large, noticeable button on the front or top. The buttons are the only reason I gave this four stars.
customer_reviews.author: AvidCamper

customer_reviews.title: Alleviated distress in someone who has started memory loss.
customer_reviews.text: I had written the following review earlier this year when I bought the first timepiece. Because it has worked so well for her, I decided to buy another and put it in the living room. Initial review: A member of my family experiencing some memory loss. What I've noticed the most is that they have become quite obsessive about knowing the day of the week and the time. This clock is perfect with it's large numbers and letters. It has alleviated some of their distress plus it is a very sharp looking clock. I bought the wood trimmed one and it looks great on her kitchen table. But it could be hung too which is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful company
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for my nearly 92 year old mother last September. I purchased it upon recommendation of a friend who had used one for several years. Who knows why something quits working, but my Mom's did. It was nearly a year later. I picked it up a week or so ago, contacted the manufacturer and they sent a replacement immediately. I now have it and my Mother will be happy to have it. I am so grateful for a manufacturer that stands behind their product!
customer_reviews.author: K Toll

customer_reviews.title: Can't be happier! Wonderful clock!
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered for an elderly relative who lives out of town. She received it in 2 days (delivered on a Sunday). When they plugged in the clock, the time was sent to the proper time as well as the day & date! We were so impressed and grateful that it was preprogrammed for her. This was beyond the call of duty and it is greatly appreciated. She absolutely loves it, and for the price, this is so affordable. It's so practical, you don't have to be elderly to use it . This would be great in a doctors office, classroom or home. Thanks to this vendor for an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: NatAttack

customer_reviews.title: Best daily reminder clock
customer_reviews.text: The clock is described perfectly. It looks exactly like the picture. My elderly in-laws will really benefit from this clock. Everything you need on one screen: the day, date, year, time and a pleasant greeting! Great for dementia sufferers because it is a constant reassurance of what day, date and year it is. Plus it is easy to see from a good distance away. And the best part ever! you just have to plug it in - no setting the clock, it was ready to go right out of the box. I will be ordering one for my home as well.
customer_reviews.author: April Blair

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this clock because my daughter and her family moved to Okinawa for three year.. I set this clock at their time as they are 13 hours ahead of us. It is much easier to glance at the clock and know if I call, I will not be getting them out of bed. Not only does it tell the time, it also states the day. Not the usual purchase reason, but it is why I purchased it and it looks great on top of my refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Dad likes it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 90 year old dad... He loves most everything.. He had a few nights of waking up and thinking it was morning.. So this helps.. It is definitely bright.. He wishes it was adjustable do he could turn down a little more.. It's great to know what time of day it is.. Morning.. Afternoon.. Evening.. Arrived on time.. Good packaging.. Great product.. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great compensatory tool for memory loss
customer_reviews.text: This product is an absolute necessity for the memory challenged. My husband is a TBI (traumatic brain injury) survivor. He does not have short term memory. That being said, he can’t retain simple facts like the day,date and what year it is. Long story short...this clock is AWESOME!! I put it in the bedroom so he can see it at any time of the night(he gets up several times). My husband has told me each day,several times a day, how much he likes this clock. And me...I love it! He doesn’t need to ask me a hundred times what day it is! Please,please make sure that people with memory issues know about this clock!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Jury is still out
customer_reviews.text: So far this clock is great for my Mom who has dementia. The jury is still out on whether it’s a 5-star product though because this is the 2nd clock I’ve bought and the first one started to lose time and get the day’s wrong after about 1 month. Which is the worst thing to happen for someone with dementia - completely defeats the purpose. And I’m out the money for that last clock because I threw away the receipt when it was working so well ..... until it wasn’t. Fingers crossed this will continue to work because then it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: B. Folger

customer_reviews.title: Simple, informative, visibly appealing.
customer_reviews.text: I had looked for a high visibility clock using a video screen instead of LED/LCD about a year ago and couldn't find any that were reasonably priced. Happened on this one a week or so ago and liked the price so I bought it. Fits what I was looking for perfectly. Good visibility, clear screen, all the information I wanted (the morning/afternoon reminders are nice, considering the odd hours I keep). The power cord is just long enough to mound high on a wall if you have either an outlet or powerstrip below it. While a battery would be nice, I doubt it would be efficient with something using a screen. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Anybody know what day it is?
customer_reviews.text: Do you ever lay down just for a moment in the afternoon thinking you're going to take a 20-minute nap?but when you wake up you have no idea what day it is. Is it morning? Is it evening? And how long did I sleep? Did I miss something? Am I supposed to be somewhere. I don't have to worry or wonder anymore! I love it. This clock is a lifesaver. You wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Day

customer_reviews.title: Great for elderly parents!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clock as a Christmas present for my 92 year old mother and she loves it. Easy to set up - you take it out of the box and plug it in and it's ready to go! The only thing it doesn't do is continue to display the information when the power goes out. It has a battery backup which keeps everything until the power comes back on, but the screen is black when there is no power. Still, it's a great buy. My mother doesn't always remember that I gave it to her, but she never forgets what day it is!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is Elderly Mother's Lifeline!
customer_reviews.text: Mom has dementia and this clock truly has become like her lifeline. She checks it for everything it has to offer. It keeps her on track for the days, time and even phase of day. The screen is bright and bold and easy for her to see from her chair half way across the medium size room. It looks attractive too. We have been using it for several years now and it is still going strong! I highly recommend it and quite frequently say how amazing and connected it makes her feel. So much so that I had to come back and write this review! It is very easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Magpie2Magpie

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: We had one of those very bright blue LED large clocks but keep reading how blue light can cause some people problems plus it didn't keep great time and was hard to set and oh so glaring. This one is so much better looking with it's wood frame that matches our cabinets, is easy to set, has built in batteries for power outages (amazed I didn't have to add batteries), plus I like the automatic dimmer for evenings as next to the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Tooter102

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Idea, Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the "Day Clock" for my 84 year old mother after she suffered a stroke which impaired her vision. The letters and numbers are large enough for her to identify day and time without effort. Unfortunately, she struggles to read the month and date. I hope this company would consider making a larger clock to increase the font size on the last row for the month & date. Overall, this clock has helped my mom to see the time giving her some freedom & independence. She liked it so much, that we purchased a second one for her bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great large screen clock for seniors
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Grandmother who has trouble remembering what day it is and she can't move around much. She really appreciates the large font and easy to read DATE/TIME information. No more asking someone what day it is and feeling bad she loses track of time, she can just look up and figure it out. Helps her to look forwards to the weekends when we can come visit her as well.
customer_reviews.author: Native Idaho Nate
